title: Copyright Registration Entries (Data Entry)
job_overview:
We are looking for meticulous and reliable Data Entry Assistants to help register music copyrights through the ASCAP Portal. This role involves entering song details one at a time, requiring patience and excellent attention to detail due to the repetitive nature and variable content of the entries.

You will be responsible for accurately inputting song registration data based on provided information. This position is ideal for someone who is organized, focused, and capable of maintaining consistency across multiple entries.

We are open to hiring multiple individuals initially to determine the best long-term fit(s).

Responsibilities:

Enter music copyright information into the ASCAP Portal, one song at a time

Double-check data for accuracy and completeness before submission

Follow provided instructions and formatting guidelines

Communicate progress and flag any issues or questions that arise

Requirements:

Strong attention to detail and a high level of accuracy

Patience and focus – the task is repetitive but essential

Good English communication skills (written and verbal)

Basic computer skills and ability to navigate online forms

Reliable internet connection and personal computer

Preferred Qualifications (not required):

Prior experience with ASCAP or music copyright registration

Familiarity with music metadata (e.g. song titles, writers, splits, publishers)

Schedule & Availability:

Flexible hours

Starting as part-time with the potential to transition to full-time based on performance
